text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: The Health of the Nation Outcome Scales + (HoNOS+) is an extension of HoNOS that was developed by the UK Department of Health (Wing et al. 1998), with the aim of assessing mental health status and social status in a simple, reliable and valid way mental patients.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-HoNOSplus](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-HoNOSplus) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
